website_summaries.verdict: This floating bath thermometer looks less like a toy and is less likely to be carried off by your toddler.
pros: Tells when water is too hot or too cold for comfort
Doesn't take up much room in the tub
cons: The temperature tends to jump a bit

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, hard to turn on
customer_reviews.text: This product shows the temperature with a wide range (I've used it up to 120 degrees). I appreciate that it re-reads the temperature every few seconds so you can adjust the water flow and get an almost instant updated reading (if you want it warmer or cooler). My only complaint (and thus it lost a star) is that it is tricky to turn on. There is no button, it is turned on by motion. Sometimes I have to bang it on the side of the tub or shake it *just right* for it to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: SaveMama

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thermometer. We use it everyday for our baby’s bath to know that the water is neither too hot nor too cold. It literally says above the temperature reading if it’s out of range. It will say “COLD” or “HOT” and when it’s too hot a little red light flashes as well. This is one of those items that I never knew I needed until after the baby was born. We use it as a room thermometer too and the reading takes seconds. I’ve tested it with other thermometers and it’s accurate. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I noticed mold grew inside it, and it appears it is in areas that I cannot scrub clean. I really liked it, otherwise. What a shame. No bells and whistles for this nice thermometer, but it does what it needs to do. I use it every time I give my daughter a bath and it indicates the temperature just fine. I can't discuss its durability as I've only had it for a month or so, but no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Prisca Lo Surdo

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first, but now has failed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great so far, but have only had it a few weeks. The last one that we had (shaped like a hard shelled animal) broke very quickly. [UPDATE] 10-5-2018 The thermometer has now failed. It quit reading the temp so I figured it was the battery. I took the battery out and put it back in to re-seat the contacts and it worked for another bath or two then quit again. I then tried to put a new battery in, but now the battery door will no longer go on at all. 6 months of use is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Working thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We got one at bed bath and beyond and it only lasted 2 months before it would no longer read the correct temp (was saying scalding hot water was 104 degrees) so I looked for one on Amazon. I really like this so far, as long as it holds up and continues to read accurately I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this thermometer! We have used it 10+ times now for baby baths and fully immersed in water multiple times and it has been working great without any issues. I especially like that it flashes red when the water is too hot or too cold. Would recommend to all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Alseku

customer_reviews.title: Now it just floats...
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer was purchased to regulate tub temperature for a 22 month child. Worked perfectly first few baths. Place in water and metal sensors on bottom pick up temp to show on display. There is no on/off button. Several uses later (believe it was the 4th bath time) the thermometer was dead. Have not tinkered with it yet to determine if the moisture on the display is the cause or battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: The Shopping Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Cute & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super glad we bought this. It has made the transition from our awesome baby bathtub with built-in thermometer over to the regular bathtub so easy! I'm terrible at determining temp with my hands so this ensures I won't scald my daughter. It turns on with the slightest motion and takes quite a while to automatically turn off so it'll monitor throughout bath time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nealio

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, works quick, looks like a toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a different bath thermometer for my second child. This works quickly and my older child thinks it's a bath toy. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaShopsTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This stopped displaying accurate temperatures within about two weeks of opening the package and using the product. Upon examination of the battery compartment, I found that the tiny plastic gasket was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Hint shake it to turn it on! Love it and it’s always accurate. Use it every time we bath our babe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Saves you from guessing, wasting time & water.
customer_reviews.author: Luann McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t always work. Turns on when not in water and doesn’t turn on when placed in water. Inaccurately says water temp is cooler than what it is. Waste of money and piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: We've only had this product for about two weeks, ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this product for about two weeks, but so far it's living up to it's expectations. The bathtub we have for our 9 week old doesn't have a thermometer on it, and I'm not always 100% sure about the temperature of the water based on feel. It is comforting to know that the temperature is just right for my little one by using this device.
customer_reviews.author: Shandryka Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your buck...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After 3 months of use this thermometer stopped working. It’s not sealed properly and water came in and the device stopped working. It’s so frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: N.Y

customer_reviews.title: Took to long to turn on
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a three and that's me being nice. It still works though! But in the beginning, it would turn by itself quickly. Which was awesome. But after the first 2 weeks, it would take forever to turn on. By the time it gave me the temperature of the water, it was already getting cold. And getting a baby who hates to be naked and waiting for her bath is a bit stressful. I still use it, but I test the water myself.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect for my baths!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my baths not to make sure the water is cool enough but to make sure the water is hot enough for me! Now I get my bath to the perfect temperature before I get in. Not too hot; not too cool..just perfect! aaahhhh
customer_reviews.author: BoNiLi

customer_reviews.title: Useful item
customer_reviews.text: A good idea at any age, so you can tell ahead of time if the bath is too hot. I've only had it a short time, so can't attest to durability, but it looks well made and functions as expected.
customer_reviews.author: arPie47

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: Great little thermometer. It's light and floats in the water . It's made up of smooth firm plastic that is most likely safe if you child mouths it.
customer_reviews.author: clvc623

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We gave our newborn his first bath without this thermometer but hated guessing if the temperature was all right. Immediately bought this and have used it for every bath since then (baby is 4 months old now). It works great and gives us total peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This broke after only four months of using it. The back part that holds the battery in fell off and we were not able to screw it back on...it’s just broken. Too bad, another poorly made plastic product in the landfill
customer_reviews.author: MVJ

customer_reviews.title: Battery cover will not go back on once removed
customer_reviews.text: Loved initially. However whenbtime came to replace the battery, the batter cover would not go back on. It turns and goes down into locked position but continues to pop off after letting go. It should be marketed as disposable
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work after only 3 uses. Disappointed. Plus, using your arm or hand to test the water works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work / have only had a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Troy love this product and will recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was super paranoid I would make baby’s bath water too hot, haven’t used it with the baby yet but I tested it out myself a few times. It works as it should, if needed I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mormino

customer_reviews.title: Such a perfect bath&roo themometer!
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect bath&roo themometer! I bought this for my cousin's baby. She told me they love this, it can measure the temperature of water at any time. it is also a toy for the baby. He likes playing it when he is bathing. My cousin is happy that she don.t need to worry about the water temperature again when the baby is bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Liushu

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lasted about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it lasted, but stopped working after about 8 months of use. Gives a quick and accurate reading of the water temp, and blinks red at you if the water is too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ready to use right out of the box. Very helpful and my son loved his bath! No more guessing at the temp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Day

customer_reviews.title: it's very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Ha-ha, my baby loves to play with this in the shower. With temperature monitoring, it's very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly. I gave this a 5 because it will let you know when the water is a little bit too hot. It definitely comes in shandy
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: ... this because I take baths all the time and love the water at a specific temperature
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a baby but I bought this because I take baths all the time and love the water at a specific temperature. This product is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Tugend

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It works as advertised. Now my wife can prepare my bubble bath with the exact temperature I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermometer for price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read...accurate temperature reading. Not very large so it doesn’t take up lots of room in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: This worked great... for three weeks. It was a great device that we were using every time we put our infant in the tub. However, it’s only been three weeks since we purchased this and yesterday it broke. The back opened up, the battery came out and would not go back in, and the screen filled with water. Considering the only use it got was for short 5-10 minute bathtimes, I would have liked for it to have lasted a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: MissE

customer_reviews.title: Not great for pool, probably perfect for short term bath tub use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in our pool. Probably not made to be on for a long time so it shuts off and sometimes it's hard to turn back on while other times it comes back on immediately when you mess with the sensor. Not sure how it works to be honest. I like the idea, but implementation could be better for my use. Bath time...it's probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Stebs

customer_reviews.title: It was working fine the first day
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine the first day. After, it wouldn’t turn on it sometimes turns on when it’s just sitting there. I’m returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay upright
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use while running water in tub. Not stable enough to stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: User

product_meta.title: Famidoc Baby Bath Thermometer Floating Toy Bath Tub Thermometers, Flower
feature_bullets: ✅ Easy to use: No on-off button, Activates automatically by dropping the thermometer into water (from about 40cm/16inch in height) or pating/shaking it on your hand, Auto shut off in 30 minutes
✅ High and Low Temperature Alarm: Large LCD Displays real-time temperature in Fahrenheit, LCD displays “COLD” for low temperature and “HOT” with red LED light flashing for high temperature
✅ Bath & Room Thermometer, as well a fun and safe bath toy
✅ Highly reliable, waterproof, quick and accurate
✅ Safe and fun for children and parents, a happy bath for your little one

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
